column1: Operation Warp Speed is in full effect to provide a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine!  I agree with CDC Director Robert Redfield. We MUST ensure red tape doesn't stop this needed vaccine from getting to the American people.   America will win this battle on coronavirus. https://t.co/ZgA0stNfCW

We must renew restore and rebuild our country in the face of the COVID-19 pandemic.  I'm continuing to fight for the deployment of #ruralbroadband reopening our communities safely and responsibly and protecting our economy from #China.   America's best days are still ahead.

This was the right decision by @realDonaldTrump. The WHO's handling of the coronavirus was a total blunder covering for #China and the #CCP.  This is just the latest controversy having aggressively promoted abortion using organizational funds (much coming from U.S. taxpayers). https://t.co/zx1vaESXb5

In the case of COVID-19 the world is paying for the #CCP's dishonesty with thousands of lost lives and economic devastation. Now is the time to come together and take action to protect America from the communists in #China.  My latest in @TheHill: https://t.co/aB2TLh5ZWg

States re-opening is welcomed news!   As we grapple with the #coronavirus many furloughed or temporarily laid off employees are returning to work and businesses are bouncing back from this economic downturn.   Our response is working. Let's keep the momentum going. https://t.co/5TKOg9zjWz

Thank you for your leadership @realDonaldTrump 🇺🇸   I was part of a bipartisan group that urged President Trump to keep the National Guard serving #COVID19 relief efforts at their current status.  He listened and he delivered. They have been an extraordinary help for Missouri. https://t.co/rcOg7S6GP4

Nonprofits such as religious ministries and food pantries are vital organizations in our communities.  The Service Assurance Act affords them a layer of legal protection as states reopen protecting these core community partners against threats of COVID-19 liability lawsuits. https://t.co/TnYrHlZcO8

It’s clear that @realDonaldTrump and his admin have been leading behind the scenes not seen in the media today. This is a great exercise of leadership 👏🏽 👏🏽 👏🏽   @Bloomberg: French Drug Giant to Give U.S. Preference on Covid Vaccine  https://t.co/DaIQvThWSm

Last night I participated in the #MOTownhall with @Fox4KC and the Nexstar Media Group across Missouri.  We discussed the impact of #coronavirus on Mizzou the effects on @FortLeonardWood and @Whiteman_AFB and concerns about our food supply chain operations.  Watch below: https://t.co/aJwusfdadp

The world is waking up to #China's deliberate deceit over the #coronavirus. Once again Beijing proves it is not a trusted actor.  America it's time we cut our dependency on China for our pharmaceuticals. Let's take back control of our own security. https://t.co/GlbVaFyqk3

China’s coronavirus actions are just one of many threats it poses. @NikkiHaley is right on this!  We must reduce our dependence on #China and look for alternative supply chains for critical industries. It's time for America and our allies to stand up.  https://t.co/GNs2JoUXdZ

The #coronavirus highlights our reliance on #China in many sectors essential to national security like our pharmaceutical industry.  That's why I'm leading a bill with @RepGaramendi to reduce our military's dependency on China for basic medical supplies. https://t.co/SYY0jliAXp

#China's deceit is responsible for the #coronavirus crisis both the health crisis and the economic downfall. China must be held accountable for its spread and for making it harder for the world to respond.   @SecPompeo is absolutely right on this. https://t.co/kDTfLQAwBd

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram is a crucial element of our response to the #coronavirus.   As small business owners my husband and I know the financial uncertainty as we face this threat so we took action to ensure our employees remained on the payroll: https://t.co/vvIqShlwPv

I just voted in support of the #PaycheckProtectionProgram and Health Care Enhancement Act.  ☑️ $310b for #PPP ☑️ $75b for hospitals ☑️ $25b to expand #coronavirus testing  Help is on the way. Let’s all keep working together to win this fight. https://t.co/QoR6OZf0Sy

We cannot forget our farmers and ranchers who are in desperate need of relief. The #coronavirus has disrupted commodity values and drastically reshaped supply chains.   Our farmers and ranchers are the very folks who help feed our country. #InItTogether https://t.co/aqzClscx2F

#China must be held accountable for their lies and cover-up regarding #coronavirus. Their deceit has killed Americans and around the world crippling our economy.  We MUST work to reduce our dependency on China ESPECIALLY for our pharmaceuticals and basic medical equipment.

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram is keeping small businesses afloat and employees on the payroll as we face the #coronavirus battle.  It's time for @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer and Democrats to work with @realDonaldTrump on a clean bill to bolster PPP funds.  https://t.co/a86G385HKO

I'm pleased to see the federal government's response to the #coronavirus is finally taking shape for Missouri's hospitals:  5000+ Missouri health care providers totaling ~$618.6 million were paid through the first disbursement for hospitals under the CARES Act.

From a.m. call with @VP:  ☑️ Direct payments go out next week ☑️ $90b+ gone out to small biz ☑️ #Coronavirus hotspots stabilizing ☑️ 50k Americans brought home ☑️ $30b to hospitals more on the way  I appreciate the great leadership of VP @Mike_Pence and @realdonaldtrump’s team!

Today is #WorldHealthDay  We know the importance of rural hospitals providing critical medical resources to 2.25 million Missourians.   The men and women who operate these facilities shouldn't go unnoticed. They are on the frontlines of this #coronavirus. https://t.co/BNTLGPsEgK

#China's lies and deceit made it harder for the world to respond to the #coronavirus. They are responsible for this pandemic and should NOT be relied on for our medicine - certainly not our military's medicine.   China is a reckless global actor and must be held accountable. https://t.co/NRFstbefId

The reinforcements sent to the frontlines of this war must be as bold and extraordinary as the #coronavirus crisis itself.   That’s why Congress has come together on this legislative package to put the American people first and provide the protections they need. #InItTogether https://t.co/Zv3fPclCtL

I'm in Washington and will be voting YES on today's coronavirus bill.  We are fighting a two-front war – a public health battle and an economic battle. The reinforcements sent to the frontlines must be as bold and extraordinary as the crisis itself. https://t.co/Nf3CGMK52A

Just as @realDonaldTrump reduced our dependence on  Middle East oil we should also reduce our dependence on #China for our pharmaceuticals.  If #COVID19 has taught us anything it's that China should NOT be trusted with our servicemembers' medicine.  https://t.co/PiIBB5ZoF3

I signed onto a delegation letter to urge @realDonaldTrump to approve the request for a major disaster declaration for Missouri.  This approps would unlock much needed funds to help our communities and health care workers get the help they need amidst this #coronavirus crisis. https://t.co/SWe6d5Fqfg

#China must be held to account for their response to the #coronavirus. The lack of transparency and their shrewd secrecy made it incredibly difficult for the world to respond to #COVIDー19.  That's why I co-sponsored this resolution from @RepJimBanks.  https://t.co/u6eYmJyFYi

These stories from our rural communities need to be heard.  It’s encouraging that the current Senate #coronavirus bill includes bolstering of telehealth services vital for our rural hospitals’ capabilities.  I will fight for these resources to be in the final bill in the House. https://t.co/0k7fptBWMV

I’m happy to hear that my Senate friends have passed The Families First Coronavirus Response Act.   This bill helps Americans who need to be tested for COVID-19 provides paid sick and medical leave and helps out the small mom-and-pop shops that need relief. https://t.co/zYFl1VS04Q https://t.co/N7FLtx2f5B

I also want to thank the medical professionls and staff on the frontlines battling the #coronavirus.   These professionals like men and women of Golden Valley Memorial who handled the first case of COVID-19 in our district are the best America has to offer. We are #InItTogether https://t.co/5h8N9X5aIH https://t.co/Z9V1m8SVNJ

The #CoronavirusOutbreak highlights a grave national security concern.   In a time of conflict #China could stop our supply of generic prescription drugs and basic medical equipment. We are far too dependent on China.  From @BryanLowry3 and @KCStar: https://t.co/mqLLCDwVVR

All of us all have a part to play in defeating the #CoronavirusPandemic. For our families our neighbors and our colleagues it's important for everyone across the country to take the guidelines and precautions seriously.   We can and will get through this. #InItTogether

Some good news amidst the #coronavirus cycles:  Canada passed the #USMCA bringing the agreement one step closer to full implementation. This transcontinental agreement will do so much for American farmers ranchers and consumers.  https://t.co/Ob2w4Y8QZ4

I voted YES on H.R. 6201 the Families First Coronavirus Response Act.  This package includes free testing for symptomatic patients paid sick leave for small business employees and funds to bolster unemployment insurance programs.   I'm glad we finally got this done.

After 50+ hours we finally have bill text for the #coronavirus response. As we move forward this is not the time for partisan politics. We need a clean bill that directly addresses the needs of the American people.  My office will continue keeping you dated as info develops. https://t.co/0SyGSLjmZz

We saw that @realDonaldTrump continues to take decisive steps to mitigate the #coronavirus and protect American lives.   The early travel ban on #China and decisive actions on travel have saved lives and have proven pivotal in our efforts to combat the virus.

This morning I joined @MariaBartiromo to discuss ways Congress is addressing the #coronavirus public health threat. I also got to chat with @KJTorrance about our efforts to curb the national security threat from #China that the coronavirus highlights. https://t.co/ko9cKVhdWP

Good morning #MO04! I was on @Fox4KC to update the Kansas City area on the #coronavirus. Taking precautions is important given that Missouri confirmed its first case this weekend. My office continues to work with federal and state authorities to ensure Missourians are safe. https://t.co/z6sVnosWH2

Getting a clean spending bill to give @realDonaldTrump and @VP the resources they need to confront the #coronavirus threat is good governance.  I’m glad that my colleagues on the other side of the aisle put politics aside and worked with us for the safety of our communities. https://t.co/jk86n33RJw

Congress should NOT be playing politics with #coronavirus funding bills. This is not the time to fill them up with politically-loaded language and irrelevant funding requests.  We need to help keep our communities safe not play politics with people's lives. https://t.co/x7dSLTApRH

My office will continue to provide updates as we receive information about the coronavirus from state and federal agencies tasked with addressing this grave public health issue.   As of right now Missouri is NOT affected by the coronavirus.  https://t.co/JJc3vCebYg

The @VP is more equipped than any of his critics to lead the #coronavirus response effort. I look forward to working with @realDonaldTrump and @Mike_Pence to ensure Missourians are safe in the face of this grave public health and national security threat. https://t.co/7nRd8mKoPR

My office met with Missouri Health and Senior Services to discuss Missouri’s preparedness regarding the coronavirus.   They’ve assured us with high confidence that Missouri is in good shape with an ability to prevent treat and contain it if needed.  Missouri is well prepared.
